title: Luxury House for Sale in Battaramulla [HS5]
details:
Construction to Commence - Completion In December 2018

A beautifully designed 3-storey house located 1 km from the Thalawathugoda Junction, within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. Accessible via a 15-20 foot access road, the property resides in a quiet residential neighborhood.

The property offers extensive living space along with four bedrooms and three bathrooms. The house features a spacious living & dining area, kitchen, double garage, maids quarters, rooftop terrace and landscaped gardens.

Ground Floor Plan
- Large living and dining section [Open to large garden space]
- Guest bedroom & common washroom
- Kitchen
- Outdoor terrace area
- Enclosed parking space for 2 vehicles
- Servants room & toilet

1st Floor Plan
- TV lobby
- Master bedroom with walk-in closet, attached bathroom & access to two private balcony terraces [One of which is replete with greenery]
- Two additional bedrooms and common washroom [One bedroom with access to large terrace]

2nd Floor Plan
- Lobby area
- Expansive terrace area

Starting Price: LKR 34 Million Upwards
